RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 6F Dirt CR: 55. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRACING LUCKY rallied to the lead along the inside at the quarter pole shaking clear in upper stretch holding up under a drive. DONT CROSS BOUDICA chased the pace extending from mid track down the lane closing the gap late in a solid debut. MS. LADY T slow early lost ground to upper stretch showing late interest six wide. IMA SURE BET slow early raced inside down the lane finishing evenly. MELINOE pressured the pace through the turn tiring in upper stretch. PROVOLONE pressed early then faded to upper stretch. HIGHWAY ROBBERY was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Highway Robbery
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Fracing Lucky
ENTRY.COMMENT: rallied to lead inside 1/4 pole, cleared top lane, held driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Melinoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, tired lane

ENTRY.NAME: Dont Cross Boudica
ENTRY.OWNER: Seaman Sally N and Seaman Cecil O
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, extended mid track lane, closed gap

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Lady T
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, had late interest

ENTRY.NAME: Ima Sure Bet
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, raced inside down the lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Provolone
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, faded lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LONE LEADER set the pace shaking clear in upper stretch being ridden out. CANT GLIDE BY KATZ threatened on the turn being rebuffed in upper stretch chasing from mid track saving place. WHISKEY SUNRISE raced evenly through the turn losing ground to upper stretch gaining a spot with an even finish. RECKLESS AFFAIR slow early raced wide to upper stretch improving position there. I'LL FINISH pressed early weakening on the turn. PAPA CHARLES was never involved. ELUSIVE MOTION chased to the quarter pole wearing out in upper stretch. CAPE MARCO DRIVE struggled throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Whiskey Sunrise
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lost ground to lane, gained some 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Cape Marco Drive
ENTRY.COMMENT: struggled throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Elusive Motion
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased through turn, spent

ENTRY.NAME: Papa Charles
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Finish
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Cant Glide by Katz
ENTRY.COMMENT: threatened on turn, rebuffed top lane, held for place mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Reckless Affair
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, wide into lane, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Lone Leader
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, drew off top lane, ridden out,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 56. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 118 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'LL SMOKEM set the pace being hooked near the quarter pole rebuffing foe in upper stretch holding firm to wire. ROYALLY FLUSHED gained on the turn losing ground to upper stretch bidding six wide late saving place. KOLTEN'S PRIDE faded on the turn racing along the inside down the lane gaining some position while no threat. JEAN JET rushed wide pressing at the quarter pole weakening in upper stretch. SPIDER PIG had brief speed then faded on the turn. EL KOZAN dropped back early.

ENTRY.NAME: Spider Pig
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief foot, faded on the turn

ENTRY.NAME: Kolten's Pride
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn, raced inside lane, gained position

ENTRY.NAME: Royally Flushed
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained on the turn, lost ground to lane, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: El Kozan
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back early

ENTRY.NAME: Jean Jet
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed wide to press on the turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: I'll Smokem
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, pressed turn, responded to clear lane, held firm

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SOUTHERN SENSE went evenly through the turn coming five wide in upper stretch surging late to prevail. GILLIGAN tracked the pace looming four wide in upper stretch surging late on the inside of the eventual winner. EL CARDINAL hustled to clear on the turn widened on the inside in upper stretch digging in late faltering to wide pressure. TEN TWENTY NINE slow early lagged to upper stretch moving past the others there. JULIE'S FERRARI raced evenly lacking more. KICKSTARTER sent clear led early ceding on the turn weakening inside in upper stretch. HARD N'SWEET was never involved. PRETTY STORMY was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Ten Twenty Nine
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, moved past the others

ENTRY.NAME: Gilligan
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, loomed 4 wide lane, rallied late

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Kickstarter
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, passed on the turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Hard n'Sweet
ENTRY.OWNER: Vickers Richard T and Pena Yendri J
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: El Cardinal
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled clear turn, widened inside lane, faltered late on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Julie's Ferrari
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, lacked late response,

ENTRY.NAME: Southern Sense
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly, 5 wide into lane, surged up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MS SUEDOO slow early swung out to upper stretch putting in a late rush eight wide arriving in time. ANNA VOLANTE pressed the pace dueling on the turn into upper stretch clearing late on the inside being run down in the final yards. TIME FOR CUPID a step slow early lost ground to upper stretch rallying late seven wide. MY PINK BABY BIRD gained on the turn extending four wide down the lane hanging late. BIZZY GAL pursued on the turn pressing in upper stretch weakening late. MY BOSS pressed the pace dueling abreast rival through the turn wearing down the final eighth. MOSE DEFINITELY was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Ms Suedoo
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, swung out to lane, late rush 8 wide, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Anna Volante
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled inside to lane, clear late, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Time for Cupid
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow, lost ground to lane, rallied late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: My Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled on tuen wore down

ENTRY.NAME: Bizzy Gal
ENTRY.COMMENT: pursued on the turn, pressed top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Mose Definitely
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: My Pink Baby Bird
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained on the turn, extended lane, hung

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile O r Over Since September 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: Q BOND lagged to the far turn circling out while advancing there surging late six wide to get up at the wire. SASSY JUSTICE unhurried early advanced on the backside threatening on the far turn wresting the lead in upper stretch clearing late being grabbed at the wire. FAIRY CAKES (GB) pressed the pace taking the lead on the far turn ceding in upper stretch weakening late on the outside. POLYESTER BRIDE dropped off on the far turn saving ground to upper stretch finishing evenly on the rail. GO STELLAIRE gave a prompted middle move then leveled off on the far turn. TIMEISGOLDEN had a mild gain on the backside then gave way on the far turn. REVEIRS MINUTE set the early pace wearing out on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Q Bond
ENTRY.COMMENT: lagged to the far turn, circled out advancing, surged up 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Timeisgolden
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Fairy Cakes (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, led far turn, ceded top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Sassy Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, middle move, bid clear upper stretch, dug in

ENTRY.NAME: Reveirs Minute
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, passed far turn, spent

ENTRY.NAME: Polyester Bride
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped off far turn, saved ground to lane, finished evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 100. Allowance Purse 23800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 24 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Race s Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DOCTOR WU gained on the turn looming outside of dueling rivals in upper stretch surging up in the last yards. ICING pressed the pace dueling from the rail through the turn then down the stretch battling to the end. MORE LOVE pressed the pace dueling abreast rival through the turn then down the stretch ceding between horses at the end. EL GAVILAN gave way on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Icing
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled from rail down the lane, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Doctor Wu
ENTRY.COMMENT: gained on the turn looming abreast lane, surged up late

ENTRY.NAME: More Love
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled abreast to lane, ceded between late

ENTRY.NAME: El Gavilan
ENTRY.COMMENT: gave way on the turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 8100. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since September 24 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RUN AWAY FEVER slow early angled five wide in upper stretch surging late from mid track getting up in time. THE REIGN SONG saved ground surging to the lead in upper stretch clearing on the rail being run down in the last yards. O K BABY slow early lost ground to upper stretch moving up late seven wide. BROOKLYNN'S DABOMB chased the pace drawing even in upper stretch weakening late. MAY BEAU played no factor. MISS NUCKOLS broke sharply setting the pace through the turn wearing out in upper stretch. PASSINGTHEMISTERY broke slowly then rushed hard wide through the turn flattening out in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: May Beau
ENTRY.COMMENT: played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Run Away Fever
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, angled 5 wide lane, surged mid track, in time

ENTRY.NAME: The Reign Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, surged into lane, cleared on rail, run down

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Nuckols
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Brooklynn's Dabomb
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased the pace, dueled top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: O K Baby
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lost ground to lane, moved up late 7 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Passingthemistery
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, rushed wide, flattened out,
